org.jemmy.action

extends java.lang.Object
    Author:

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(java.lang.Object... parameters)
      Executes run() method of this Action, saving the duration of its execution and storing any RuntimeException and Error which may occur during its work.
      boolean failed()
      Indicates whether action invocation failed.
      long getAllowedTime()

      Returns throwable that occurred during run() invocation.

      void setAllowedTime(long allowedTime) 
      java.lang.String toString()
      Override this method to provide action description which will be printed into output.
      protected boolean withinAllowedTime()
      Should be used from {@linkplain #run(java.lang.Object[]) run()) method to check whether execution time is withing allowed time

      • execute

        public final void execute(java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Executes run() method of this Action, saving the duration of its execution and storing any RuntimeException and Error which may occur during its work.
        Parameters:

        See Also:

      • withinAllowedTime

        protected boolean withinAllowedTime()
        Should be used from {@linkplain #run(java.lang.Object[]) run()) method to check whether execution time is withing allowed time
        Returns:
        true if difference between current time and start time is less then allowed time; false otherwice
